documents.document: @oOoOoBarracuda Brilliant, me too! :) Are you up already, or still? ;)
Another early morning <3 How are you doing? :)
“The difference between real life and the movies is that a movie script has to make sense.” ~Joseph L. Mankiewicz #quote
@SUPERRROCKSTAR Will you be local? :)
How about you? Want to meet up for coffee in L.A. next week? :)
@Jenntrick Aww, too bad! I would have loved to grab a coffee with you. Hopefully next time :) <3
Want to meet up for coffee in L.A. next week? :)
“Let each become all that he was created capable of being.” ~Thomas Carlyle #quote
“I do not try to dance better than anyone else. I only try to to dance better than myself.” ~Mikhail Baryshnikov #quote
What a lovely early morning! Come and celebrate with me :) <3
@Jenntrick Beautiful! *hug* <3
Ask me anything, and I might even answer ;) http://www.formspring.me/GoodQuotes
@Jenntrick Aww, I’ve missed you too, my friend <3 I’m doing good as well, thanks for asking :)
@rhabekost Happy downhill, then. Or something ;)
“Marriage may often be a stormy lake, but celibacy is almost always a muddy horse pond.” ~Thomas Love Peacock #quote
@Jenntrick Hey Jenn, I hope you’re doing great :)
@danielleraexx You too, my dear friend :) <3
@bonfollis Awesome! :)
@danielleraexx Great to hear, Danielle! I’m doing good too, thanks for asking :)
How are you guys doing? :) <3
“Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.” ~Anton Chekhov #quote
Wonderful Wednesday <3
“We are always the same age inside.” ~Gertrude Stein #quote
“You can’t build a reputation on what you intend to do.” ~Elizabeth ‘Liz’ Smith #quote
“She’s a model and she’s looking good” ~Hütter / Bartos / Schult #lyrics #MusicMonday
“When we dance, angels will run and hide their wings” ~Sting #lyrics #MusicMonday
@LiteraryNobody Hey, you :) I’m doing great, I hope you and The Aces are doing great as well. We just had our beautiful dc made of awesome.
“… the truth is in the kiss, you can’t get more honest than this” ~Dweezil Zappa #lyrics #MusicMonday
“I have nothing to hide from you, just one kiss and you’ll know it’s true…” ~Dweezil Zappa #lyrics #MusicMonday
“… and I remember wanting you near me, but I couldn’t have you, you were so far from me, and I couldn’t stand it” ~Dweezil Zappa #lyrics #MM
“I remember thinking of you, when I was alone, I won’t deny it, I thought the world of you…” ~Dweezil Zappa #lyrics #MusicMonday
“Freedom is an internal achievement rather than an external adjustment.” ~Adam Clayton Powell, Jr. #quote
@oOoOoBarracuda Awesome! I’m really happy for you Ashley :) Did you ever receive my email regarding your photo?
How are you guys doing? I’m having a wonderful weekend, I hope you are too :) <3
“Extreme hopes are born from extreme misery.” ~Bertrand Russell #quote
@jennychanto Awesome ;) <3
“Friendship is like wetting your pants—everyone can see it, but only you can feel its warmth.” ~Incognito #quote
Have a Fabulously Fun and Friend-Filled Friday! <3
@jennychanto Hey Jenny, I hope you’re doing great :) <3
“To grow mature is to separate more distinctly, to connect more closely.” ~Hugo von Hofmannsthal #quote
@calashi Thank you very much for your compliment :)
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “Failure is simply a few errors in judgment, repeated every day.” ~Jim Rohn #jimrohn #quote
I wish you all had a wonderful Wednesday <3
“We ain’t going to win every battle, but can win the war.” ~Dennis Hopper (May 17, 1936 – May 29, 2010) #quote
“I don’t hurt or want for visibility, but people seem to forget pretty easily.” ~Gary Coleman (February 8, 1968 – May 28, 2010) #quote
“Those who weep recover more quickly than those who smile.” ~Jean Giraudoux #quote
“On the sands of life sorrow treads heavily, and leaves a print time cannot wash away.” ~Henry Neele #quote
“Only when we are no longer afraid do we begin to live.” ~Dorothy Thompson #quote
@KieraS You, my friend, have been DM’d ;)
Happy Tuesday, everyone—don’t forget to smile :) <3
“Will they open their eyes, and realise we are one” ~Tremonti/Kennedy #lyrics #MusicMonday
@KieraS Aweosome! I’m doing good too, thanks for asking :) I’m actually visiting your ’hood in a couple of weeks. Want to grab a coffee?
“… Every morning I wake up and I think of you with a smile on my face, I’m a man in love, and she’s glorious” ~Basshunter #lyrics #mm
“There is one girl in my life that makes me love again, as pretty as a girl can be, so beautiful…” ~Basshunter #lyrics #MusicMonday
@KieraS Hi Kiera, thank you for the RT. How are you doing? :)
“There may be peace without joy, and joy without peace, but the two combined make happiness.” ~John Buchan #quote
Thanks for the replies yesterday. And for those who asked, I was in the studio myself, working on a song. We didn’t get much done that day…
“On the broken stem of dreams only disappointments grow.” ~William Wetmore Story #quote
Where were you when the second tower got hit?
“There is no way to peace—peace is the way.” ~A. J. Muste #quote
“The greater your capacity to love, the greater your capacity to feel the pain.” ~Jennifer Aniston #quote
@hashemi810 Excellent! Welcome, Mahdi :)
Anyone seen #just1heather lately? :\
“Humility is the only true wisdom by which we prepare our minds for all the possible changes of life.” ~George Arliss #quote
“… Summertime girls got it going on, shake and wiggle to a hip hop song” ~LFO #lyrics #remember
“Summer girls come and summer girls go, some are worth while and some are so-so…” ~LFO #lyrics #remember
“… I like girls that wear Abercrombie and Fitch, I’d take her if I had one wish, but she’s been gone since that summer” ~LFO #lyrics
“New Kids On The Block had a bunch of hits, Chinese food makes me sick…” ~LFO #lyrics #remember
I don’t usually do this, but now I will just have to…
“Man is born to live and not to prepare to live.” ~Boris Pasternak #quote
How creepy timely was my LFO quote yesterday… crikey :\
“… Summertime girls got it going on, shake and wiggle to a hip hop song” ~LFO #lyrics #remember ;)
“Summer girls come and summer girls go, some are worth while and some are so-so…” ~LFO #lyrics
“… I like girls that wear Abercrombie and Fitch, I’d take her if I had one wish, but she’s been gone since that summer…” ~LFO #lyrics ;)
“New Kids On The Block had a bunch of hits, Chinese food makes me sick…” ~LFO #lyrics #remember ;)
Hah, iTunes on shuffle brought me ‘Summer Girls’ by LFO, does anyone else remember this one? :) #blastfromthepast
“Poetry is the art of creating imaginary gardens with real toads.” ~Marianne Moore #quote
“Reality is determined not by what scientists or anyone else says or believes but by what the evidence reveals to us.” ~Alan Hale, Sr #quote
@oOoOoBarracuda Aww, I’ve missed you too. I hope you’ve gotten proper sleep lately :)
@Leslie_Mills Thank you for the RT, Leslie. No, wait, thank you for the *original* :)
Happy Tuesday, everyone :) <3
“… Why do I tire of counting sheep, when I’m far too tired to fall asleep” ~Adam Young #lyrics #MusicMonday @oOoOoBarracuda ;)
“Leave my door open just a crack, ’cause I feel like such an insomniac…” ~Adam Young #lyrics #MusicMonday
“’Cause I’d get a thousand hugs, from ten thousand lightning bugs, as they tried to teach me how to dance…” ~Adam Young #lyrics #MusicMonday
“… It’s hard to say that I’d stay awake when I’m asleep, ’cause everything is never as it seems” ~Adam Young #lyrics #MusicMonday
“I’d like to make myself believe, that Planet Earth turns slowly…” ~Adam Young #lyrics #MusicMonday
“You would not believe your eyes, if ten million fireflies, lit up the world as I fell sleep” ~Adam Young #lyrics #MM
@danielleraexx Me neither ;)
@Jenntrick Thank you! *hug* :) <3
“A-ha, mm-m, I will get along without you now” ~UB40 #lyrics #MusicMonday
Hugs to you, my friend @Jenntrick :)
@Nessagirly Having Walmart followers can be scarier than having Twitter followers ;)
@danielleraexx I would, but I seem to have misplaced your number :)
“… Someone to see all of you, without turning away, or being afraid…” ~@Leslie_Mills #lyrics #MusicMonday
“… For every one step forward I’m taking two steps back, can you get it inside your head, I’m tired of dancing” ~Fish #lyrics #MusicMonday
“It’s a gentleman’s excuse me, so I’ll take one step to the side, can you get it inside your head, I’m tired of dancing…” ~Fish #lyrics #MM
Yes, there is a typo in the quote, I know, but I won’t delete and rewrite it now ;)
Winsen @winsenkamto you are a retweeting machine, thank you for the RTs :)

“… And it feels like the perfect time, just to break away, this is my life, it’s a sojourn from the norm” ~Natasha Bedingfield #lyrics #MM
